Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Location

Prominently situated south of Coped Hall roundabout, where the A3102 and B4042 converge, and adjacent to Aldi Supermarket. The A3102 east connects to junction 16 of the M4 Motorway and west to Royal Wootton Bassett Town Centre

Description

+ Semi-detached trade counter / warehouse / workshop unit
+ Steel portal frame construction with brick / glazed / steel profile clad elevations
+ 10% translucent roof panels
+ 3.6m eaves and 3.2m clear internal height to the warehouse
+ Electric loading door measuring 3.85m wide by 2.51m high
+ Separate office / WC / ancillary accommodation
+ Associated parking providing 10 marked car spaces
+ We understand mains services are provided including water, drainage and electricity
+ EPC rating of C 69

Travel Distances

+ Royal Wootton Bassett Town Centre – 1.2 miles (2 km)
+ Junction 16 of the M4 Motorway – 2.9 miles (4.7 km)
+ Swindon – 5.7 miles (9.2 km)
+ Calne – 10.4 miles (16.7 km)
+ Malmesbury – 10.4 miles (16.7 km)
+ Marlborough – 15.8 miles (25.4 km)
+ Bristol – 38.6 miles (62.1 km)

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: UNIT 1 _ 2 TRINITY PARK_ SWINDON SN5 5FZ FLOORPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Trinity Park is situated at Hillmead in north west Swindon. It has excellent road connections with junction 16 of the M4 being approximately 3 miles to the south west, and the A419 dual carriageway being approximately 3 miles to the north west.  The A419 provides a link to the M5 to the north at Gloucester and junction 15 of the M4 to the south. Oxford is also easily accessed via the A420. Hillmead is a well-established industrial and distribution location as well as being popular with a number of car retail franchises. Local amenities are available at nearby Bridgemead which includes a Sainsbury’s supermarket as well as the Orbital Shopping Park.

 Trinity Park is a new speculative development consisting of industrial / warehouse units, potentially suitable for a headquarters facility. 

 The two units that are being built can be combined to provide a single unit with offices of 78,750 sq ft.

 Accommodation split options:

* Single Unit - 78,750 sq ft

* Two Units - Unit 1: 42,000 sq ft and Unit 2: 36,750 sq ft

 Both will benefit from a thoughtfully designed and landscaped environment, HGV access and demised car parking provision. In addition to the proposed development, consideration will also be given to bespoke design and build solutions to meet an occupier’s specific needs.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: TRINITY PARK_ SWINDON_ SN5 5WB YARD _ OFFICES

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: UNIT 1 _ 2 TRINITY PARK_ SWINDON SN5 5FZ FLOORPLAN
